availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles F. Billingsly (Todd County, KY, clerk)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of John Billingsly and Judith Billingsly. Student in Todd County in 1850. Clerk in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District no. 1, p. 220B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 746.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, part of Ward 8, p. 109A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 3rd Congressional District, Todd County, Vol. 1 of 3, February 1864, p. 25, (Accessed via ancestry.com on February 13, 2020).
